title: Bi-Weekly Food and Recipes Thread
selftext:
Foodies of r/India! Tried out a new dish? Experimented with cooking yourself and lived to tell the story? Share here!

Feel free to share recipes, and if you tried out something new, you can also share pictures!

**The Food Thread is posted every two weeks on Friday mornings.**

https://preview.redd.it/tti3fyiqw8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=899972afbc4bab665798a0f5917960a98ec4f4d5
comments: Anybody got recipes for snacks to eat while drinking alcohol.
unfortunately I don't like the taste of maggi when i'm drunk.
I'mma go ahead and say a bacon, chilli, cheese filled sabudana vadas would be bomb.

light_cleaned_selftext: Foodies of r/India! Tried out a new dish? Experimented with cooking yourself and lived to tell the story? Share here! Feel free to share recipes, and if you tried out something new, you can also share pictures! **The Food Thread is posted every two weeks on Friday mornings.**
light_cleaned_comments: Anybody got recipes for snacks to eat while drinking alcohol. Raw maggi unfortunately I don't like the taste of maggi when i'm drunk. Score the fish; Marinate the fish for about 30 mins in the fridge; **lime juice, bit of cooking oil, masala/ChilliP, salt, pepper & herbs** Sautee some freshly chopped ginger, garlic, green chilli and onions in a sauce pan just until the onions start to sweat; **not too much of these, just enough to coat the fish here and there** Plop the marinated fish in the pan and toss Em on each side of for couple of mins on a low to med flame; **cut into a fish and see if it‚Äôs done** Sever hot and pour a cold one üçª PS: can replace the fish with a variety of seafood I'mma go ahead and say a bacon, chilli, cheese filled sabudana vadas would be bomb. Thank you
